title: App Store Small Business Program no longer prohibits app transfers
content:
Apple in 2020 announced a new App Store Small Business Program, which allows developers to qualify for a commission rate of 15% if they earn up to $1 million. However, Apple had been rejecting developers who transferred apps from one account to another – which is fortunately no longer the case.

more…

The post App Store Small Business Program no longer prohibits app transfers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple updated its guidelines to remove app transfer prohibition for participation in the App Store Small Business Program.
